about-us-section-text: The free software market is a natural consequence of putting software in the hands of players. Trade games! The free market will discover the true price of the software.
about-us-distribution: Control the price of the game and the number of licenses issued. Earn money in the secondary market. Everything under your control.
about-us-provision: You are the only publisher. Don't let anyone else make money off your hard work. Will you make more money this way or will you lower the price of the game to reach a larger audience? The decision is yours!
header-par: DEFInitial game license media editing. P2P game exchange between players. Cartridge on blockchain. Without intermediaries. 0% commission. End the monopoly in the software market…
airdrop-reserve: Reserve your unique Nickname to receive the Airdrop
airdrop-nick: Your nickname will represent your presence on the HashUp platform
airdrop-connect: Connect to Metamask to copy your reflink
calc-result: With us, so much goes to you
calc-result-label-lose: You lose so much on commissions
crt-crtdg-header-go: Let's go back to the days before
crt-crtdg-text: We long for the times when by purchasing a game license we actually became its owner. The current software distribution model means that the digital goods we purchase do not really belong to us. But all is not lost! HashUp with the help of a digital cartridge will allow you to enjoy full control again. Trade in your games! After all, they are yours!
gamecap-text: Buy software the easy way. On the platform, you will find all information about the game you want to buy. Track the price and supply. Follow specific projects. Stay up to date!
gamecontract-text: Create a smart contract using an intuitive editor. Determine the distribution method, aftermarket rules, and link the cartridge to the software.
gamelibrary-nick-customize: customize your player profile as you wish
gamexplorer-text-gamers: Gamers love to take care of their libraries. GameXplorer will allow them to showcase their collections in a better way than ever.
gamexplorer-text-dev: As a developer, you will have the opportunity to release a collector's edition of your game that is sure to catch the eye of collectors.
infonotes-note1-content: Make money speculating with your own game.
infonotes-note3-content: Earn more through the free market.
partners-label: Together we will change the world
partners-text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
roadmap-header-when: when are we going to do all this
szymon-jankowski: He is passionate about economics, computer science and practical applications of blockchain.
filip-szydlowski: Lawyer and cryptocurrency supporter, familiar with working at law firms and startups.
rafal-bielenia: He has an extensive background in software and algorithmics, having worked at Google and Microsoft.
cezary-dobrowolski: Enthusiast of value giving marketing. Loves to build a relationship between customers and the brand.
walletselector-text: Choose how you wish to access your wallet.
roadmap-box-2-bullet-6: Development of green and red cartridge
roadmap-box-3-bullet-3: Creation of blue, gold and grey cartridge
roadmap-box-3-bullet-5: Publication of GameContract, GameCap and GameXplorer
roadmap-box-3-bullet-6: Listing of the first free market game on GameCap
roadmap-box-3-bullet-7: Ability to release HTML5 games on HashUp cartridges
roadmap-box-4-bullet-2: Building a team to help publish games on Blockchain
roadmap-box-4-bullet-3: Free and easy airdrops of first games
roadmap-box-4-bullet-4: Release of HashWallet, enabling release of PC games
roadmap-box-4-bullet-5: First partnerships with major game and software publishers.
roadmap-box-5-bullet-2: Organisation of the first HashUp event in Poland for Game Developers.
roadmap-box-5-bullet-5: Start of work on GameXchange and GamePaper
roadmap-box-5-bullet-6: Publication of HashWallet on Android and IOS
roadmap-box-5-bullet-7: Opening of FIAT payment gateway -> # and # -> FIAT
roadmap-box-6-bullet-2: $1 billion # turnover and cartridges on the platform
roadmap-box-6-bullet-3: Publication of GameXchange, DEX with AMM and Order Book
cartridges-tab-header: Buy the game. Play. Sell. Cartridge on blockchain. The HashUp Cartridge!
cartridges-tab-header-small-1: We've created entirely new game carriers. On the blockchain. P2P.
cartridges-tab-header-small-2: Your game will finally be yours. You need us because you can't lend your game to a friend.
cartridges-tab-green-description: The free market. And that's it!
cartridges-tab-green-bullet-4: Color: Green as a green candle!
cartridges-tab-gray-description: The HashUp Cartridge Standart. Own the game.
cartridges-tab-blue-target: Creators who want to have everything under control.
cartridges-tab-blue-bullet-3: Price: defined by free market, but Creators can controll exchange fee's.
cartridges-tab-red-description: No exchange between players. What it is now. Only the Creator can send the game between addresses!
cartridges-tab-red-target: Creators who are afraid of the free market!
tomaszsmus: Doctor of Law and Economics. He brought Bitcoin to the Polish world.
krzysztofpiech: One of the first Bitcoin pioneers in the Polish academic world.
krzysztofchmielewski: Senior lecturer in game research and design at Kazimierz Wielki University. Production manager at Flybridge Studio.
